In England, in the seven days to 27 August, there were 176,938 new confirmed cases (312.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 20 August, there were 185,688 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 5% (8,750 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 01 September is 5,904,664 (10,441.5 cases per 100,000 population).
